titleStmt.title: A letter to a lawyer containing an essay to prove the compassing and imagination of the death of the King's brother and heir to be high-treason within 25 Ed. 3 / written by a gentleman in the country, and one of His Majesties justices of the peace for the county of -----.
titleStmt.author: Gentleman in the country and one of His Majesties justices of the peace.

notesStmt.note: Dated at end of letter: Sept. 29, 1684.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
